description:

Mike spills the beans and tells us that he sucked Jace's cock after the first shoot.

Jace says he'd be down to let a guy suck his cock again and he might fuck a guy and give him head. He even says he'd be down to let a guy fuck him too. Mike is pulling out all the stops with this stud and Jace is playing right along.

He's been to Iraq twice we learn as he tells us a little about his military career. He's a big sports fanatic and likes to party. By the time his first solo is over, Mike has him showing off his perfect asshole and raising his legs up to his chest. I'm so glad we get a double dose of this perfect stud.
title: Jace 2
